text: @KirstieMAllsopp @BBCNewsnight Illness is/has always been an assessment of risk & probability but 100 kids have developed to need for ICU beds that is a significant number when we were all told the younger pretty much the least likely they are to suffer from covid19. Last wk it was 35 its a very big jump yeah.
